instruction.en: Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into inclusion mode, short press the productâ€™s Action button that you can find on the product's housing.

hint.en:
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline.

The automatic reports (configured by parameter 101/102/103) can be sent to the associated nodes in association group 1.
